mcq.statement: An electron is moving along the axis of a solenoid carrying a current, which of the following is a correct statement about the electromagnetic force acting on the electron? The force acts in the direction of motion, The force acts perpendicular to its motion, The force acts anti-parallel to its motion, No force acts

options.a: The force acts in the direction of motion
options.b: The force acts perpendicular to its motion
options.c: The force acts anti-parallel to its motion
